meaningMnemonic: Deep in your <radical>soul</radical>, you feel like you want to pull your <radical>fang</radical>s out by the <radical>root</radical>, but instead you let out a loud <kanji>sigh</kanji>. You're one of the only people you know that has fangs, and it weighs heavily on your soul.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>sigh</kanji> again and say, "I wish I was just a normal <reading>guy</reading> (がい)." I swear the rest of me is a guy like the rest of you. *sigh*
